org.phantomapi.gui

Class PhantomSelectDialog<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.gui.PhantomWindow
      • org.phantomapi.gui.PhantomDialog
        • org.phantomapi.gui.PhantomSelectDialog<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of object to bind elements to
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener, Dialog, SelectDialog<T>, Window

    public class PhantomSelectDialog<T>
extends PhantomDialog
implements SelectDialog<T>
    Bind objects to elements and return the objects via callback methods instead of the clicked element
    Author:
    cyberpwn
